quotes.quote: Just when I discovered the meaning of life, they changed it.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of stupid people in large groups.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Those who dance are considered insane by those who cannot hear the music.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: I might not be able to change the world, just want to make sure I will not be changed by the world.
“Three stones are enough to wipe one's arse.”
quotes.author: Greek
